sentences.sContent: an English-born man with Irish parentage
sentences.sCn: 出生于英格兰的爱尔兰裔男子

sentences.sContent: He was born in France in 1670 of unknown parentage (= nobody knows who his parents were ) .
sentences.sCn: 1670 年他出生于法国，家世不明。

synos.tran: 出身；亲子关系；门第；起源

words.tran: 父母亲的，父母的；亲代的，亲本的
父亲（或母亲）；父母亲；根源

trans.tranCn: 出身；亲子关系；门第；起源
trans.tranOther: someone’s parents and the country and social class they are from
